subject: CommandPalette lacks focus trap/ARIA dialog
description: CommandPalette renders a full-screen overlay but never traps focus or sets dialog semantics. There is no role="dialog"/aria-modal, no initial focus, and tabbing can move focus behind the overlay. Add a focus trap, set appropriate ARIA (role, aria-modal, aria-labelledby), move focus to first command on open, and restore focus on close. File: packages/web/src/components/shared/CommandPalette.tsx (around lines 33-63).
